verses.1: “A kha sagihna a ni masa ni-in kikhopna siangtho khat na nei ding uh a, tua ni-in leitung nasep na sem kei ding uh hi. Tua ni pen note in peengkul na tum ni ding uh hi a,
verses.2: meihal biakna, Topaʼ tungah a gim namtui na piak dingte un: Bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sagih, a vekpi-in a sitbaang lo hi ding hi.
verses.3: Bawngtal tawh piak dingin sathau tawh a kibawl annel ahi an tawh biaknate lawh thum, tuutal tawh lawh nih,
verses.4: le tuuno sagihte khat ciangin lawh khat hi ding hi.
verses.5: Note adingin kilemna bawl nadingin khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat zong hi ding hi.
verses.6: A khasim meihal biakna le an tawh biakna le a kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna le an tawh biakna le tuate ading ngeina a om bangin a gim namtui, Topaʼ tungah mei tawh kihal biakna ahi leenggahzu tawh biaknate banah hi ding hi.
verses.7: “Hih kha sagihna a ni sawm ni-in a siangtho kikhopna khat na nei ding uh a, an tangin tua ni-in na na sem kei ding uh hi.
verses.8: Topaʼ tungah a gim namtui meihal biakna na piak dingte un: Bawngtalno khat, tuutal khat le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sagih hi dinga, tuate pen noteʼ muhna ah a sitbaang lo hi ding hi.
verses.9: Sathau tawh a kibawl annel tawh biaknate pen, bawngtal tawh piak khawm dingin lawh thum, a tuutal tawh lawh nih,
verses.10: tuuno sagihte khat ciangin lawh khat hi ding hi.
verses.11: Kilem nadingin khialhna hanga biakna le a kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna le an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate banah khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat zong hi ding hi.
verses.12: “A kha sagihna ni sawm le ni nga ni-in a siangtho kikhopna khat nei-in tua ni-in leitung nasep na sem kei ding uh a, Topa adingin ni sagih sung pawi na kham ding uh hi.
verses.13: A ni masa ni-in meihal biakna, Topaʼ tungah a gim namtui, mei tawh kihal biak nadingin bawngtalno sawm le thum, tuutal nih, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sawm le li na pia ding uh a, tuate a sitbaang lo hi ding hi.
verses.14: Sathau tawh a kibawl annel ahi an tawh biaknate pen, bawngtal sawm le thumte khat ciangin lawh thum, tuutal nihte khat ciangin lawh nih,
verses.15: le tuuno sawm le lite khat ciangin lawh khat hi ding hi.
verses.16: A kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna, an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate banah khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat zong hi ding hi.
verses.17: “A ni nih ni-in bawngtalno sawm le nih, tuutal nih le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sawm le li, a vekpi-in a sitbaang lo,
verses.18: ngeina kip om bangin a phazah tawh kizui-in bawngtalte, tuutalte le tuunote tawh piak dingin an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate zong hi ding hi.
verses.19: A kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna le an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate banah khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat zong hi ding hi.
verses.20: “A ni thum ni-in bawngtal sawm le khat, tuutal nih le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sawm le li, a vekpi-in a sitbaang lo,
verses.21: ngeina kip om bangin a phazah tawh kizui-in bawngtalte, tuutalte le tuunote tawh piak bangin an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate zong hi ding hi.
verses.22: A kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna le an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate banah khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat zong hi ding hi.
verses.23: “A ni li ni-in bawngtal sawm, tuutal nih le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sawm le li, a vekpi-in a sitbaang lo,
verses.24: ngeina om bangin a phazah tawh kizui-in bawngtalte, tuutalte le tuunote tawh piak dingin an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate zong hi ding hi.
verses.25: A kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna, an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate banah khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat zong hi ding hi.
verses.26: “A ni nga ni-in bawngtal kua, tuutal nih le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sawm le li, a vekpi-in a sitbaang lo,
verses.27: ngeina kip om bangin a phazah tawh kizui-in bawngtalte, tuutalte le tuunote tawh piak dingin an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate zong hi ding hi.
verses.28: A kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna le an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate banah khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat zong hi ding hi.
verses.29: “A ni guk ni-in bawngtal giat, tuutal nih le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sawm le li, a vekpi-in a sitbaang lo,
verses.30: ngeina kip om bangin a phazah tawh kizui-in bawngtalte, tuutalte le tuunote tawh piak dingin an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate zong hi ding hi.
verses.31: A kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna, an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate banah khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat zong hi ding hi.
verses.32: “A ni sagih ni-in bawngtal sagih, tuutal nih le kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sawm le li, a vekpi-in a sitbaang lo,
verses.33: ngeina kip om bangin a phazah tawh kizui-in bawngtalte, tuutalte le tuunote tawh piak dingin an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate zong hi ding hi.
verses.34: A kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna, an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate banah khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat zong hi ding hi.
verses.35: “A ni giat ni-in a thupi kikhopna khat na nei ding uh a, tua ni-in leitung nasep na sem kei ding uh hi.
verses.36: Meihal biakna, mei tawh kihal biakna, Topaʼ tungah a gim namtui na piak dingte un: Bawngtal khat, tuutal khat, kum khat a pha tuuno a pa sagih, a vekpi-in a sitbaang lo,
verses.37: ngeina kip om bangin bawngtal, tuutal le tuunote a phazah tawh kizui-in piak khawm dingin an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate zong hi ding hi.
verses.38: A kitatsat lo-a meihal biakna le an tawh biakna le leenggahzu tawh biaknate banah khialhna hanga biakna-in keel a pa khat zong hi ding hi.
verses.39: “Na thuciam biakpiakna uh le utthu-a na biakpiaknate uh banah na meihal biaknate le an tawh na biaknate le leenggahzu tawh na biaknate le thunuam a na biak nadingun a kiseh na pawi hunte uh ah hihte, Topaʼ tungah na pia ding uh hi,” a ci hi.
verses.40: Topa in Moses a thupiak bangin amah in Israel mite tungah a thu a kimin a gen sawn hi.
